```{r load corpus, include=FALSE}
# Load Corpus
m_corpus <- get_m_corpus("../data/m_corpus.csv")  %>%
  select(speaker,
         gender,
         mode,
         prompt,
         acc_phon, 
         phr_phon,
         fin_phon,
         utt_mean_f0) %>%
  mutate(h_start =
           if_else(
             !is.na((str_extract(phr_phon, "%H|\\^\\[%H|% H\\*"))),
             T,
             F),
         h_start = factor(h_start, levels = unique(h_start)),
         # Remove register tier identifier from fin_phon.
         fin_phon = str_replace_all(fin_phon, "\\]", ""),
         fin_phon = factor(fin_phon, levels = unique(fin_phon))
)

```


### LME model analysis using initial model
```{r}
# set current equation
cur_equation  <-
  "utt_mean_f0 ~ mode +
(1 | acc_phon) + (1 + mode | speaker) + (1 | fin_phon) + (1 | prompt)"

```

#### ``r cur_equation``

```{r fig.height=3, fig.width=9, message = FALSE, tidy = TRUE}
utt_mean_f0_mdl = lmer(
  formula(cur_equation),
  data = m_corpus,
  control = lmerControl(
    optimizer = "optimx",
    calc.derivs = FALSE,
    optCtrl = list(
      method = "nlminb",
      starttests = FALSE,
      kkt = FALSE
    )
  )
)

# model needs trimming
m_corpus.trimmed <- m_corpus %>% filter(abs(scale(resid(utt_mean_f0_mdl))) <= 2.9)

utt_mean_f0_mdl = lmer(
  formula(cur_equation),
  data = m_corpus.trimmed,
  control = lmerControl(
    optimizer = "optimx",
    calc.derivs = FALSE,
    optCtrl = list(
      method = "nlminb",
      starttests = FALSE,
      kkt = FALSE
    )
  )
)

summariseLME(utt_mean_f0_mdl, run_step = TRUE,
              write="anova/utt_f0.csv")
```

```{r random effect of prompt, fig.height=2, fig.width=5}
plot_model(utt_mean_f0_mdl,
           type="re",
           axis.title = c("semitones", "prompt"),
           title="random effect",
           show.values = T)[2:4]
```

```{r fig.height=2.5, fig.width=5, results="asis"}
utt_mean_f0.tidy <- analyseModel(
  utt_mean_f0_mdl,
  write="utt_f0"
)
utt_mean_f0.tidy$table
```


```{r slopes}
# Get number of levels in target treatment variable.

charts <- getModelFixedFX(
  my_equation = cur_equation,
  my_data = m_corpus.trimmed,
  write="utt_f0"
)
# NB for this, we aren't actually interested in the slopes of acc_phon, but the of mode
charts$intercepts
charts$slopes

```
